Extracted Variables:
- \( x \): number of chocolate crepes made
- \( y \): number of peanut butter crepes made

Extracted Constraints:
- Chocolate Spread Constraint: \( 3x \leq 400 \)
- Peanut Butter Spread Constraint: \( 4y \leq 450 \)
- Crepe Mix Constraint: \( 6x + 7y \leq \text{Total crepe mix needed} \)
- Minimum Chocolate Crepe Constraint: \( x \geq 0.25(x+y) \)
- Peanut Butter Crepe Exceeds Chocolate Crepe Constraint: \( y \geq x + 1 \)

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize \( 6x + 7y \)
